download_dataverse_data <- function(id, outdir = tempdir(), files = NULL, version = ":latest",

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
                                    server = NULL, key = NULL, load = TRUE, refresh = FALSE, branch = NULL, verbose = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    !
                    
                      
  if (missing(id)) cli_abort("{.arg id} must be specified")

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!is.character(outdir)) cli_abort("{.arg outdir} must be a character")

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    5x
                    
                      
  meta <- download_dataverse_info(id, server = server, key = key, refresh = refresh, branch = branch)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    4x
                    
                      
  fs <- vapply(meta$latestVersion$files, function(m) m$dataFile$filename, "")

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    4x
                    
                      
  which_files <- if (!is.null(files)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    4x
                    
                      
    if (is.numeric(files)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    2x
                    
                      
      files[files <= length(fs)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    2x
                    
                      
      grep(paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    2x
                    
                      
        "(?:", paste(gsub(".", "\\\\.", files, fixed = TRUE), collapse = "|"), ")"

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    2x
                    
                      
      ), fs, TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    !
                    
                      
    seq_along(fs)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    4x
                    
                      
  if (!length(which_files)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    !
                    
                      
    cli_abort(cli_bullets(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    !
                    
                      
      x = "{.arg files} could not be matched to available files",

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    !
                    
                      
      i = paste0("check {.url ", meta$persistentUrl, "}")

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
    )))

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    4x
                    
                      
  outdir <- paste0(normalizePath(outdir, "/", FALSE), "/")

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    4x
                    
                      
  dir.create(outdir, FALSE, TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    4x
                    
                      
  data <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    4x
                    
                      
  ffsx <- paste0(outdir, fs)

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    4x
                    
                      
  ffs <- sub("\\.(?:xz|bz|gz)$", "", ffsx)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    !
                    
                      
  if (refresh) unlink(c(ffsx, ffs))

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    4x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(key)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    !
                    
                      
    if (verbose) cli_alert_info("looking for API key in fall-backs")

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    4x
                    
                      
    key <- Sys.getenv("DATAVERSE_KEY")

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    4x
                    
                      
    if (key == "") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    !
                    
                      
      key <- getOption("dataverse.key")

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    4x
                    
                      
  if (length(which_files) == length(fs) || !missing(version)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    2x
                    
                      
    zf <- paste0(outdir, gsub("\\W", "", meta$latestVersion$datasetPersistentId), ".zip")

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    !
                    
                      
    if (verbose) cli_alert_info("downloading dataset: {meta$latestVersion$datasetPersistentId}")

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    2x
                    
                      
    if (is.character(key)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
      if (verbose) cli_alert_info("trying with key")

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    2x
                    
                      
      tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    2x
                    
                      
        system2("curl", c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    2x
                    
                      
          paste0("-H X-Dataverse-key:", key),

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    2x
                    
                      
          "-o", zf,

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    2x
                    
                      
          paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    2x
                    
                      
            meta$server, "api/access/dataset/:persistentId/versions/", version, "?persistentId=",

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    2x
                    
                      
            meta$latestVersion$datasetPersistentId

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    2x
                    
                      
        ), stdout = TRUE),

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    2x
                    
                      
        error = function(e) NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
      if (verbose) cli_alert_info("trying without key")

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
      tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    !
                    
                      
        download.file(paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
          meta$server, "api/access/dataset/:persistentId/versions/", version, "?persistentId=",

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
          meta$latestVersion$datasetPersistentId

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    !
                    
                      
        ), zf, quiet = TRUE, mode = "wb"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
        error = function(e) NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    2x
                    
                      
    if (file.exists(zf)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    2x
                    
                      
      unzip(zf, exdir = sub("/$", "", outdir))

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    2x
                    
                      
      unlink(zf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
    } else if (verbose) cli_alert_info("failed to download dataset {meta$id}; trying individual files...")

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    4x
                    
                      
  for (i in which_files) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    4x
                    
                      
    m <- meta$latestVersion$files[[i]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    4x
                    
                      
    meta$latestVersion$files[[i]]$local <- ffs[i]

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    4x
                    
                      
    if (!file.exists(ffs[i]) && !file.exists(ffsx[i])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    !
                    
                      
      if (verbose) cli_alert_info("downloading file: {.file {m$label}}")

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    1x
                    
                      
      if (is.null(key)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    !
                    
                      
        if (verbose) cli_alert_info("trying without key")

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    !
                    
                      
        tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    !
                    
                      
          download.file(

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    !
                    
                      
            paste0(meta$server, "api/access/datafile/", m$dataFile$id), ffsx[i],

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    !
                    
                      
            quiet = TRUE, mode = "wb"

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
          ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    !
                    
                      
          error = function(e) NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    !
                    
                      
        if (verbose) cli_alert_info("trying with key")

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    1x
                    
                      
        tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    1x
                    
                      
          system2("curl", c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    1x
                    
                      
            paste0("-H X-Dataverse-key:", key),

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    1x
                    
                      
            "-o", ffsx[i],

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    1x
                    
                      
            paste0(meta$server, "api/access/datafile/", m$dataFile$id)

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    1x
                    
                      
          ), stdout = TRUE),

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    1x
                    
                      
          error = function(e) NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    !
                    
                      
      if (verbose && !file.exists(ffsx[i])) cli_alert_info("failed to download file: {.file {m$label}}")

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    4x
                    
                      
    if (file.exists(ffsx[i])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    3x
                    
                      
      if (verbose && m$dataFile$md5 != md5sum(ffsx[i])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    !
                    
                      
        cli_warn("file was downloaded but its checksum did not match: {.file {ffsx[i]}}")

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    3x
                    
                      
      if (grepl("(?:xz|bz|gz)$", ffsx[i])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    !
                    
                      
        if (verbose) cli_alert_info("decompressing file: {.file {ffsx[i]}}")

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    3x
                    
                      
        system2(

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    3x
                    
                      
          c(xz = "xz", bz = "bunzip2", gz = "gzip")[substring(ffsx[i], nchar(ffsx[i]) - 1)],

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    3x
                    
                      
          c("-df", shQuote(ffsx[i]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    4x
                    
                      
    if (load && file.exists(ffs[i])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    !
                    
                      
      if (verbose) cli_alert_info("loading file: {.file {ffs[i]}}")

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    4x
                    
                      
      fn <- sub("\\..*", "", m$label)

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    4x
                    
                      
      data[[fn]] <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    4x
                    
                      
        (if (grepl("\\.json$", ffs[i])) read_json else fread)(ffs[i]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    4x
                    
                      
        error = function(e) NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    4x
                    
                      
      if (verbose && is.null(data[[fn]])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    !
                    
                      
        cli_warn("file was downloaded but failed to load: {.file {ffs[i]}}")

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    4x
                    
                      
  ffs <- ffs[which_files]

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    4x
                    
                      
  if (verbose && any(!file.exists(ffs))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    !
                    
                      
    cli_warn("failed to download file{?s}: {.file {ffs[!file.exists(ffs)]}}")

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    4x
                    
                      
  invisible(if (load) if (length(data) == 1) data[[1]] else data else meta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Reformat an SDAD-formatted dataset

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Unify multiple files, which each contain a tall set of variables associated with regions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' The basic assumption is that there are (a) entities which (b) exist in a hierarchy, and

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' (c1) have a static set of features and (c2) a set of variable features which

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' (d) are assessed at multiple time points.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' For example (and generally), entities are (a) regions, with (b) smaller regions making up larger regions,

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' and which (c1) have names, and (c2) population and demographic counts (d) between 2009 and 2019.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param files A character vector of file paths, or the path to a directory containing data files.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param value Name of the column containing variable values.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param value_name Name of the column containing variable names; assumed to be a single variable per file if

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' not present.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @param id Column name IDs which uniquely identify entities.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @param time Column name of the variable representing time.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @param dataset Column name used to separate entity scales.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @param value_info A vector of column names which provide additional information about values

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' (such as their name and type).

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @param entity_info A list containing variable names to extract and create an ids map from (

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{entity_info.json}, created in the output directory). Entries can be named to rename the

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' variables they refer to in entity features.

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @param formatters A list of functions to pass columns through, with names identifying those columns

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' (e.g., \code{list(region_name = function(x) sub(",.*$", "", x))} to strip text after a comma in the

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' "region_name" column).

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @param out Path to a directory to write files to; if not specified, files will not be written.

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' data_reformat_sdad("data/directory")

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @return An invisible list of the unified variable datasets, split into datasets.

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
data_reformat_sdad <- function(files, value = "value", value_name = "measure", id = "geoid", time = "year",

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
                               dataset = "region_type", value_info = "measure_type",

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
                               entity_info = c(type = "region_type", name = "region_name"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
                               formatters = NULL, out = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (length(files) == 1 && dir.exists(files)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    !
                    
                      
    files <- list.files(files, full.names = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    !
                    
                      
  if (any(!file.exists(files))) cli_abort("file{? does/s do} not exist: {.file {files[!file.exists(files)]}}")

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    1x
                    
                      
  vars <- c(value, value_name, id, time, dataset, value_info, entity_info)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    1x
                    
                      
  spec <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    1x
                    
                      
    missing(value), missing(value_name), missing(id), missing(time), missing(dataset),

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    1x
                    
                      
    rep(missing(value_info), length(value_info)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    1x
                    
                      
    rep(missing(entity_info), length(entity_info))

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    1x
                    
                      
  data <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    1x
                    
                      
  names <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    1x
                    
                      
  for (f in files) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    2x
                    
                      
    d <- tryCatch(fread(f), error = function(e) NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    !
                    
                      
    if (is.null(d)) cli_abort("failed to read in file {.file {f}}")

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    2x
                    
                      
    if (any(su <- !vars %in% colnames(d))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
      if (all(su)) cli_abort("no variables found in file {.file {f}}")

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    1x
                    
                      
      if (any(!spec[su])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    !
                    
                      
        cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
          "table from {.file {f}} does not have {?a column name/column names} {.var {vars[su][!spec[su]]}}"

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    1x
                    
                      
      vars <- vars[!su]

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    1x
                    
                      
      spec <- spec[!su]

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    2x
                    
                      
    names <- c(names, list(colnames(d)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    2x
                    
                      
    set(d, NULL, "file", f)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    2x
                    
                      
    d[[value_name]] <- sub("^:", "", paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    2x
                    
                      
      sub("^.*[\\\\/]", "", gsub("^.*\\d{4}(?:q\\d)?_|\\.\\w{3,4}$", "", f)), ":", d[[value_name]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
    ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    2x
                    
                      
    data <- c(data, list(d))

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    1x
                    
                      
  common <- Reduce(intersect, names)

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!value %in% vars) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
    a <- common[!common %in% vars]

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    !
                    
                      
    if (!length(a)) cli_abort("could not figure out which column might contain values")

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    !
                    
                      
    if (length(a) > 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    !
                    
                      
      a <- a[which(vapply(a, function(col) is.numeric(d[[col]])))]

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
      if (!length(a)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
        cli_abort(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
          "no potential value columns were numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    !
                    
                      
          i = "check variable classes, or specify {.arg value}"

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
        ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    !
                    
                      
      value <- a[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
      vars <- c(value, vars)

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    1x
                    
                      
  vars <- c(vars, "file")

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    1x
                    
                      
  data <- do.call(rbind, lapply(data, function(d) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    2x
                    
                      
    d <- d[, vars, with = FALSE]

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    2x
                    
                      
    if (id %in% vars) d[[id]] <- trimws(format(d[[id]], scientific = FALSE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    2x
                    
                      
    d

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
  }))

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    1x
                    
                      
  cn <- colnames(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(formatters)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    !
                    
                      
    for (n in names(formatters)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    !
                    
                      
      if (n %in% cn) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    !
                    
                      
        data[[n]] <- formatters[[n]](data[[n]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!id %in% vars) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    !
                    
                      
    id <- "id"

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    !
                    
                      
    vars <- c(id, vars)

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    !
                    
                      
    data <- cbind(id = unlist(lapply(table(data$file), seq_len), use.names = FALSE), data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    1x
                    
                      
    data <- data[!is.na(data[[id]]) & data[[id]] != "NA"]

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    1x
                    
                      
  data[[id]] <- as.character(data[[id]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!dataset %in% vars) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    !
                    
                      
    dataset <- "dataset"

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    !
                    
                      
    data <- cbind(data, dataset = "dataset")

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!time %in% vars) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    !
                    
                      
    time <- "time"

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    !
                    
                      
    data <- cbind(data, time = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!any(value_name %in% vars)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    !
                    
                      
    value_name <- "file"

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    1x
                    
                      
  data[[dataset]] <- gsub("\\s+", "_", data[[dataset]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    1x
                    
                      
  datasets <- unique(data[[dataset]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    1x
                    
                      
  variables <- unique(data[[value_name]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    1x
                    
                      
  times <- sort(unique(data[[time]]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(out)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    1x
                    
                      
    entity_info <- as.list(entity_info)

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    1x
                    
                      
    entity_info <- entity_info[unlist(entity_info) %in% colnames(data)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (length(entity_info)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    1x
                    
                      
      e <- as.data.frame(data[!duplicated(data[[id]])])

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    1x
                    
                      
      e <- e[, c(id, dataset, unlist(entity_info)), drop = FALSE]

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    1x
                    
                      
      if (!is.null(names(entity_info))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    1x
                    
                      
        su <- which(names(entity_info) != "")

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    1x
                    
                      
        colnames(e)[su + 2] <- names(entity_info)[su]

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    1x
                    
                      
      write_json(

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    1x
                    
                      
        lapply(split(e, e[, 2]), function(g) lapply(split(g[, -(1:2)], g[, 1]), as.list)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    1x
                    
                      
        paste0(out, "/entity_info.json"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    1x
                    
                      
        auto_unbox = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    1x
                    
                      
      if (interactive()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    !
                    
                      
        cli_bullets(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    !
                    
                      
          v = "Created entity metadata file:",

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    !
                    
                      
          `*` = paste0("{.file ", out, "/entity_info.json}")

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
        ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    !
                    
                      
  if (all(nchar(times) == 4)) times <- seq(min(times), max(times))

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    1x
                    
                      
  sets <- lapply(datasets, function(dn) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    2x
                    
                      
    d <- if (dataset %in% vars) data[data[[dataset]] == dn] else data

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    2x
                    
                      
    do.call(rbind, lapply(unique(d[[id]]), function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    5x
                    
                      
      ed <- d[d[[id]] == e]

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    5x
                    
                      
      n <- length(times)

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    5x
                    
                      
      r <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    5x
                    
                      
        ID = rep(as.character(e), n), time = times, check.names = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    5x
                    
                      
        matrix(NA, n, length(variables), dimnames = list(times, variables))

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    5x
                    
                      
      for (v in variables) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    15x
                    
                      
        su <- ed[[value_name]] == v

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    15x
                    
                      
        su[su] <- !is.na(ed[[value]][su])

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    15x
                    
                      
        if (sum(su)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    7x
                    
                      
          vals <- ed[su]

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    7x
                    
                      
          r[as.character(vals[[time]]), v] <- vals[[value]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    5x
                    
                      
      rownames(r) <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    5x
                    
                      
      r

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
    }))

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
  })

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    1x
                    
                      
  datasets <- gsub("\\s+", "_", tolower(datasets))

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    1x
                    
                      
  names(sets) <- datasets

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(out)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    1x
                    
                      
    for (f in datasets) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    2x
                    
                      
      write.csv(sets[[f]], paste0(out, "/", f, ".csv"), row.names = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (interactive()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    !
                    
                      
      cli_bullets(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    !
                    
                      
        v = "Reformatted data files written:",

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    !
                    
                      
        structure(paste0("{.file ", out, "/", datasets, ".csv}"), names = rep("*", length(datasets)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
      ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    1x
                    
                      
  invisible(sets)

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Adds a menu to a website

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Adds a section to arrange inputs, that can optionally be collapsed, and positioned on any side.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... Elements to appear in the menu.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param position A character indicating which side to place the menu on; one of

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{"top"}, \code{"right"}, \code{"bottom"}, or \code{"left"}.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param width Width of the menu, if \code{position} is \code{"left"} or \code{"right"}.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param height Height of the menu, if \code{position} is \code{"top"} or \code{"bottom"}.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param collapsible Logical; if \code{FALSE}, removes the button to open or close the menu.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param default_open Logical; if \code{TRUE}, the menu will start open.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param wraps Logical or character (\code{"row" or "col"}); if \code{FALSE},

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' elements of the menu will not be wrapped in row or column elements.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param sizes The relative size of each wrapper, between 1 and 12, or \code{"auto"}; default is equal size.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @param breakpoints Bootstrap breakpoint of each wrapper; one of \code{""} (extra small), \code{"sm"},

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @param conditions A character for each element representing the conditions in which that should be showing

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' (e.g., \code{c("", "input_a == a", "")}); \code{""} means the element's display is not conditional.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' page_menu(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   input_select("menu item", c("a", "b", "c"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A character vector of the content to be added.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
page_menu <- function(..., position = "right", width = "300px", height = NULL, collapsible = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
                      default_open = FALSE, wraps = TRUE, sizes = NA, breakpoints = NA, conditions = "") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    4x
                    
                      
  caller <- parent.frame()

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    4x
                    
                      
  building <- !is.null(attr(caller, "name")) && attr(caller, "name") == "community_site_parts"

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    4x
                    
                      
  parts <- new.env()

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    4x
                    
                      
  attr(parts, "name") <- "community_site_parts"

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    4x
                    
                      
  parts$uid <- caller$uid

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    4x
                    
                      
  elements <- substitute(...(), environment())

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    4x
                    
                      
  n <- length(elements)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    4x
                    
                      
  vertical <- position %in% c("left", "right")

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    4x
                    
                      
  wraps <- rep_len(if (length(wraps) == 1 && !is.character(wraps) && wraps) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (vertical) "row" else "col"

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    !
                    
                      
    wraps

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    4x
                    
                      
  }, n)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    4x
                    
                      
  sizes <- rep_len(sizes, n)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    4x
                    
                      
  breakpoints <- rep_len(breakpoints, n)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    4x
                    
                      
  conditions <- rep_len(conditions, n)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    4x
                    
                      
  ids <- paste0("menu", parts$uid, seq_len(n))

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    4x
                    
                      
  parts$uid <- parts$uid + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    !
                    
                      
  if (is.numeric(width)) width <- paste0(width, "px")

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    !
                    
                      
  if (is.numeric(height)) height <- paste0(height, "px")

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    4x
                    
                      
  r <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    4x
                    
                      
    paste0(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    4x
                    
                      
      '<div state="', if (default_open) "open" else "closed", '" class="menu-wrapper menu-', position, '"',

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    4x
                    
                      
      c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    4x
                    
                      
        ' style="', position, ": ", if (default_open) 0 else paste0("-", width), "; ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    4x
                    
                      
        if (!is.null(height)) c("; height: ", height),

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
        '"'

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
      ">"

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    4x
                    
                      
    ), collapse = ""),

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    4x
                    
                      
    paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    4x
                    
                      
      '<div class="menu', if (vertical) " col" else " row",

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    4x
                    
                      
      if (!default_open) " hidden", " menu-", position, '">'

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    4x
                    
                      
    unlist(lapply(seq_len(n), function(i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    4x
                    
                      
      c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    4x
                    
                      
        if (!is.na(wraps[i])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    4x
                    
                      
          paste(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    4x
                    
                      
            '<div class="', wraps[i],

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    4x
                    
                      
            if (!is.na(breakpoints[i])) c("-", breakpoints[i]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    4x
                    
                      
            if (!is.na(sizes[i])) c("-", sizes[i]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    4x
                    
                      
            '"', if (conditions[i] != "") paste0(' id="', ids[i], '"'), ">"

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    4x
                    
                      
          ), collapse = "")

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
        },

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    4x
                    
                      
        eval(elements[[i]], parts),

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    4x
                    
                      
        if (!is.na(wraps[i])) "</div>"

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    4x
                    
                      
    }), use.names = FALSE),

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    4x
                    
                      
    "</div>",

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    4x
                    
                      
    if (collapsible) paste0('<button type="button" class="menu-toggle" title="', position, ' menu"></button>'),

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    4x
                    
                      
    "</div>"

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    4x
                    
                      
  if (building) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    2x
                    
                      
    caller$body <- c(caller$body, r)

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    2x
                    
                      
    for (n in names(parts)) if (n != "content") caller[[n]] <- c(caller[[n]], parts[[n]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    2x
                    
                      
    caller$uid <- parts$uid

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    2x
                    
                      
    if (any(conditions != "")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
      ids <- ids[conditions != ""]

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
      conditions <- conditions[conditions != ""]

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    !
                    
                      
      for (i in seq_along(conditions)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
        caller$rules <- c(caller$rules, list(list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
          condition = parse_rule(conditions[i]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    !
                    
                      
          effects = list(display = ids[i])

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
        )))

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    4x
                    
                      
  r

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Add a tooltip-like display to a website

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Adds an output to display information about a hovered-over or selected data point.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param title Title text, or the source of title text.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param body A list of entries in the info body section, which can be raw text or references to features or

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' data variables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param row_style A character specifying how rows should be displayed: \code{"table"} (default)

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' to place names and values in separate columns of a table row, or \code{"stack"} to place names over values.
